nodes.text: Vargos 9 was a location in the galaxy visited by Mika Grey during her search for a Sith relic. Grey was being chased by First Order Raiders at the time, and believed she had been able to lose them at Vargos 9 until they turned up again on Ashas Ree.
Vargos 9 was first mentioned in "The Relic Raiders", the seventh episode of the second season of Star Wars Resistance.
